name: word-add-in-hello-world
title: Create an Word Add-in that displays hello world
shortDescription: Create a simple Word Add-in that displays hello world.
longDescription: Learn how to build the simplest Office Add-in with only a manifest, HTML web page, and a logo. Understand the fundamental parts of an Office Add-in.

thumbnails.alt: Diagram showing a hello project consists of a manifest, HTML page, and image assets.

references.name: Office Add-ins platform overview
references.description: You can use the Office Add-ins platform to build solutions that extend Office applications and interact with content in Office documents.
